posts.title: Hello配置
posts.text: hexo基本配置安装并在本地运行 搭建过程需要安装git客户端,npm,nodejs可参考官网-地址 1.初始化hexo博客命令 hexo init blog #初始化blog cd blog cnpm install hexo g hexo s 2.初始化完成后访问http://localhost:4000/ 部署到github中1.修改更路径下_config.yml deploy: type: git repository: git@github.com:justshowmethecode/justshowmethecode.github.io.git branch: master 2.安装deploy插件 cnpm install hexo-deployer-git --save 3.部署 hexo d 4.访问https://justshowmethecode.github.io/ icarus主题配置官网 地址 安装1.安装 git clone https://github.com/ppoffice/hexo-theme-icarus themes/icarus 2.配置根目录_config.yml theme: icarus 3.生成icarus配置 hexo g hexo s 新建基本页面1.tags页面 hexo new page "tags" 2.分类主页 hexo new page "categories" 修改主页菜单1.主题配置文件themes/icarus/_config.yml navbar: # Navigation bar menu links menu: 主页: / #归档: /archives 分类: /categories 标签: /tags #关于: /about 接入评论1.主题配置文件themes/icarus/_config.yml comment: type: valine app_id: DmzLuD1Do0eJ156ihBCtLvh0-gzGzoHsz # (required) LeanCloud application id app_key: lxddgMoHBtoznGozilj8rtSS # (required) LeanCloud application key notify: false # (optional) receive email notification verify: false # (optional) show verification code placeholder: '留下你的评论吧!' # (optional) comment box placeholder text 中文转拼音1.安装插件 cnpm i hexo-permalink-pinyin --save 2.配置根目录_config.yml permalink_pinyin: enable: true separator: '-' # default: '-' 调整为双栏目模式参考 目录粘性配置1.修改layout/widget/toc.ejs -<div class="card widget" id="toc"> +<div class="card widget column-left is-sticky" id="toc"> 2.参考配置 图片相对目录配置参考1.安装插件 cnpm i --save hexo-asset-link 2.图片插入 ![](/2020/01/01/hexo-an-zhuang-pei-zhi/2020-01-05-12-07-03.png) 代码高亮highlight: androidstudio 显示阅读更多1.在提交内容中添加摘要部分，则自动显示阅读更多 --- title: Hello配置 date: 2020-01-01 15:59:10 toc: true excerpt: hexo基本配置使用 categories: - [工具, Hexo] tags: - Hexo --- 2.在文中插入 <!--more-->

posts.title: oracle存储过程权限授权
posts.text: 串接脚本select输出如何串接其他字符串SELECT column1, 'ABC' || Lic_num FROM TABLE_ONE 查询用户下所有PACKGE的名字 select object_name from dba_objects where owner = 'CCM' and object_type = 'PACKAGE'; 存储过程查询调试需要的权限 debug和execute需要指定到packge的名字因此需要串接 grant execute on ccm.pck to read_insert; grant debug on ccm.pck to read_insert; grant DEBUG CONNECT SESSION to read_insert; 串接脚本 涉及将查询结果拼接并输出到文件中 set long 10000000 set head off set echo offf set pagesize 0 set verify off set feedback off spool body.sql SELECT 'GRANT EXECUTE ON CCMBATCH.'||OBJECT_NAME||' TO READ_INSERT;' FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE OWNER='CCMBATCH' AND OBJECT_TYPE='PACKAGE'; SELECT 'GRANT DEBUG ON CCMBATCH.'||OBJECT_NAME||' TO READ_INSERT;' FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE OWNER='CCMBATCH' AND OBJECT_TYPE='PACKAGE'; spool off;
